ability.name: You Were Watching the Wrong One
ability.flavor: They can't watch both of you at once.

metadata.file_basename: You Were Watching the Wrong One
metadata.item_name: You Were Watching the Wrong One

effects.effect: As long as you have one or more allies within 5 squares of the target, you gain 1 surge. If you are flanking the target when you use this ability, choose one ally who is flanking with you. That ally also gains 1 surge.
